Package be.brahms.rent_serve.services.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.services.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Service implementation for managing users. Uses UserRepository to perform database operations.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public User register(User user)
      This method registers a new user. Check before the user has been more than 18 years old It sets the role to MEMBER, hashes the password, and makes the user not active. It also makes a token (not used here). Then it saves the user. Send an email for active the account
      Specified by:
      register in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      user - the user to register
      Returns:
      the saved user
